abstract: Those concerned about their online profiles have a range of options, from deactivating their accounts completely to limiting who sees past posts.
snippet: Those concerned about their online profiles have a range of options, from deactivating their accounts completely to limiting who sees past posts.
lead_paragraph: SOCIAL media can be a harmless and easy way to keep track of friends, family and news.

headline.main: Swear Off Social Media, for Good or Just for Now
headline.print_headline: Swear Off Social Media, for Good or Just for Now
